name: Birb peak
description:
BIRB PEAK About:

 A pretty simple game made originally for the Game Jam Fábrica de Jogos 2018, a brazilian game jam. Sadly we could not submit the game in time, so we are releasing it as a fragment (aka an incomplete game) for the Fragment Jam. In it, you are tasked with climbing a mountain, with the help of the local birds and a little bird glued to you shoulder, as well.

 Yes, it is pretty silly!

 The Fabrica de Jogos Jam theme was "É melhor um pássaro na mão do que dois voando", which is equivalent in english to "a bird in the hand is worth two in the bush".

Controls:
  • Arrow keys to move;
  • Press Z to jump;
  • Hold Z mid-air to glide with the help of a bird glued on your shoulder.
